item.title: OpenStack Neutron
item.description: Software Defined Network Functionality L2 switching Virtual switch: support Linux Bridge and Open vSwitch. Based on the Linux Bridge and OVS, Neutron supports VLAN. Besides, Tunneling overlay network like VxLan and GRE are supported. L3 routing Virtual router: leverages IP forwarding and iptables to do routing and NAT. Load balancing Firewall Key points Network Local: Instance can only access to the instances on the same node. Flat: no VLAN tagging.
